### Key Messages

Key messages summarise the main findings of the NBA, explain why they matter, and point to practical actions, responses, and interventions that can be taken in response. There are [15 key messages](./content/key-messages/index.qmd) in the NBA 2025 that are clustered into three themes:

```{=html}
<div class="km-tile-wrap">
  <a class="km-tile" 
      href="./content/key-messages/index.html#kma/"
      style="background-color:#FAA755;">
    <h4>Cluster A</h4>
    <img src="/imgs/icon-km-cluster-a.png" alt="">
    <p>Cross-realm pressures on South Africa’s biodiversity are impacting people</p>
  </a>
  <a class="km-tile" 
      href="./content/key-messages/index.html#kmb"
      style="background-color:#70B276;">
    <h4>Cluster B</h4>
    <img src="/imgs/icon-km-cluster-b.png" alt="">
    <p>Improving the status of South Africa's biodiversity is key to a sustainable and equitable future for all</p>
  </a>
  <a class="km-tile" 
      href="./content/key-messages/index.qmd#kmc"
      style="background-color:#9D85BE;">
    <h4>Cluster C</h4>
    <img src="/imgs/icon-km-cluster-c.png" alt="">
    <p>Inclusive actions across the whole of government and whole of society are needed to secure nature's contributions to people</p>
  </a>
</div>
```
